scripts.postpublish: yarn run postpublish:segment & git push && yarn run postpublish:now-deploy && yarn run postpublish:subtree
scripts.postpublish:git:subtree: git subtree push novel-segment-cli master --prefix packages/novel-segment-cli && git subtree push node-segment master --prefix packages/novel-segment && git subtree push node-segment-dict master --prefix packages/segment-dict
scripts.ncu: yarn run ncu:root && yarn run ncu:ws
scripts.ncu:ws: npx yarn-tool ws exec yarn-tool ncu -- -u
scripts.sort-package-json: yarn run sort-package-json:root && yarn run sort-package-json:ws
scripts.sort-package-json:ws: npx yarn-tool ws exec yarn-tool sort
